summary: New Zealand is an island country in the Pacific Ocean with two main islands: the North Island and the South Island. It was the last large land to be settled by humans, with Polynesians arriving around 1280-1350. Dutch and British explorers discovered it in the 1600s and 1700s, leading to British colonization. New Zealand became independent in 1947 and is now a developed country known for its quality of life and low corruption. It has a diverse culture influenced by MƒÅori and European traditions. The country is governed by a Parliament and has a strong economy based on services, industry, and agriculture.
title: New Zealand
